user.title: Adapter and Qdrant
user.description: Configure the adapter endpoint and Qdrant access.

data_description.confidence_threshold: Allow adapter intents only when the confidence is between 0.0 and 1.0 (default 0.7).
data_description.night_mode_start_hour: Hour (0-23) when stricter guardrails begin, defaults to 23.
data_description.night_mode_end_hour: Hour (0-23) when night mode guardrails lift, defaults to 6.
data_description.deduplication_window_seconds: Ignore duplicate intents received within this many seconds (default 2).
data_description.refresh_interval_minutes: How often to sync the catalog to Qdrant in minutes (default 5).
data_description.intents_config: JSON object of intent names mapped to enabled state, slot hints, and thresholds.
